game_language.chs: 复活并清空所有储存格子！
game_language.chs_t: 復活並清空所有儲存格子！
game_language.eng: Revive and claer all rope from the storage grid!

game_language.chs: 点击钉子回到目标栏上
game_language.chs_t: 點擊釘子回到目標欄上
game_language.eng: Click the pin to return to the target bar
Swipe left or right to rotate the object
Slide with two fingers to zoom the object

game_language.chs: 添加<color=#d05f50>1个储存格</color>，让通关更轻松！
game_language.chs_t: 添加<color=#d05f50>1個儲存格</color>，讓通關更輕鬆！
game_language.eng: Add<color=#d05f50> 1 storage grid </color>to beat levels more easily!

game_language.chs: 清除储存格中的<color=#d05f50>所有绳子</color>！
game_language.chs_t: 清除儲存格中的<color=#d05f50>所有繩子</color>！
game_language.eng: Clear<color=#d05f50>  all rope  </color>from the storage grid!

game_language.chs: 击碎1个板块，移除上面<color=#d05f50>所有绳子</color>！
game_language.chs_t: 擊碎1個板塊，移除上面<color=#d05f50>所有繩子</color>！
game_language.eng: Break 1 tile to remove<color=#d05f50> all rope </color>pins!

game_language.chs: 添加<color=#d05f50>1个格子</color>，让通关更轻松！
game_language.chs_t: 添加<color=#d05f50>1個格子</color>，讓通關更輕鬆！
game_language.eng: Add<color=#d05f50> 1 slot </color>fto beat levels more easily!

game_language.chs: 点击任意板块以打破它！
game_language.chs_t: 點擊任意板塊以打破它！
game_language.eng: Click any object to break it!
The grid has reached its limit!
